document.full_text: japanese authorities have told the u.n.'s atomic watchdog they are making preparations to distribute iodine to people living near nuclear power plants affected by friday's earthquake, the vienna-based agency said.
document.title: japan may hand out iodine near nuclear plants: iaea
lines_and_colors: japanese authorities have told the u.n.'s atomic watchdog they are making preparations to distribute iodine to people living near nuclear power plants affected by friday's earthquake, the vienna-based agency said.
